detail_desc: Trainers in suede with lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Denim jacket with sleeves and a detachable, pile-lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the hood and down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and ribbed cuffs.
Earrings in metal, plastic and resin. Three pairs with a pendant and one pair of hoops. Size from 2.5 cm to 5 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Warm-lined boots in imitation suede with a foldover top edge and a concealed hook and loop fastening at the back of the heel. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft rubber soles with anti-slip protectors.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Cotton jersey top with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
Lined bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Wide shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Soft shoes in organic cotton with lacing at the front. Cotton jersey linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Jumper in a cotton knit with a rounded, woven collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The jumper has a gently rounded longer layer in a cotton weave at the hem.
Long earrings in embossed metal. Length 6 cm.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Recycled polyester lining and filling. The polyester content of the jacket’s outer layer is partly recycled.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.

Set with a cardigan and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Cardigan with small frills on the shoulders, press-studs down the front and short slits in the sides. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, straight-cut dress in EcoNyl® mesh with organic cotton embroidery. Small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with flared cuffs and a covered button. Fitted underdress.
Shorts in an airy, patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
String body in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in a linen weave with a V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a high, elasticated waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in cotton jersey with a print motif, elasticated drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Straight-cut top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut dress in printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave that is fitted at the top. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft, gently draping fabric with an opening down the back, button at the back of the neck, and short, flared sleeves. Elasticated seam and a tie belt under the bust, and straight, wide legs.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a cotton weave with a bow.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and a decorative, draped pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons, and a detachable soft fabric belt with metal D-rings. Lined.
Chunky boots in imitation leather and pile with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Short top with narrow shoulder straps. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Cropped off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Blouse in a patterned, lightly crêped viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a small opening with ties at the hems and gathers at the shoulders.
Joggers in washed stretch twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and back pockets. Legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Short skirt in jersey with shimmering details with an elasticated waist.
Hair grips in metal decorated with glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the hair grips is recycled.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a centre seam at the back and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Leather trousers with a regular waist, front pockets, back pockets and slim legs with seams at the knees.
Set with metal earrings and ear cuffs in various designs. Four pairs of studs, one pair of hoop earrings and one pair of earrings with pendants that spell out the word LOVE. Two ear cuffs.

Set with a T-shirt and a pair of dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton. T-shirt in soft slub jersey. Dungaree shorts with buttons at the sides, detachable elastic straps with a button, and flap leg pockets. Press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and hood with sewn-on ears and appliqués. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems, and a detachable tail with a hook and loop fastening.

Pile-lined biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front, press-studs on the lapels and shoulder tabs with a fake button. Side pockets and quilted sections at the cuffs and back of the hem. Pile lining with satin-lined sleeves.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Cut-out section at the back and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sun hat in braided paper straw with a contrasting colour trim around the brim.

Suit trousers in dogtooth-patterned fabric with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Lightly padded quilted jacket in nylon with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and deep side pockets. Lined. Polyester filling.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, satin ribbons that tie at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Chiffon dress with a wide neckline, small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length, flounced sleeves, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey body with a shaped V-neck with side support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top and a lined gusset.
T-shirt in thin slub jersey with a raw-edge V-neck. Chest pocket and short sleeves with raw edges.
Sleep mask in faux fur with embroidery and appliqués. Elastic strap at the back. Satin lining.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in a textured weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Bootees in a soft knit with foldover ribbing at the top and embroidery and sewn-on ears at the front. Lined with jersey. Soft, knitted sole.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, and opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trimmed hem.
Large scarf in a soft jacquard weave with short fringes along the edges.
Short dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave. Opening at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top and short sleeves with a wide flounced trim. Unlined.
Dress shirt in a cotton weave with a wing collar and French bib front. Long sleeves with double cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jeggings in superstretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeggings is partly recycled. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
